      • validatePassword

        static void validatePassword(String password,
                    String loginName,
                    String emailAddress)
        Validates password. Checks that:
        • password is not same as login name (case insensitive)
        • password is not same as email address
        • password is not shorter than eight characters
        Parameters:
        password - password to check
        loginName - log=in name to check against
        emailAddress - email address to check against

      • validateEmailAddress

        static void validateEmailAddress(String emailaddress)
        Validates email address against RFC and throws IllegalArgumentException if invalid.
        Parameters:
        emailaddress - address to validate
